sub_title: Developer content professional, Robot builder, MongoDB Expert, LinkedIn Learning Instructor with more than 10 thousand learners
summary: Developer Content Specialist. Previous work experience from working at Twilio, MongoDB, Google, Microsoft, and Bloomberg. Passionate event organizer. Hackathon enthusiast and regular attendee. Computer Science graduate. Developer weapon of choice: Python.

treasury_media.title: MongoDB Essential Training Online Class | LinkedIn Learning
Advanced MongoDB Online Class | LinkedIn Learning
Crafting and delivering convincing demos
treasury_media.description: Words and slides alone aren’t the best way to convince your audience to choose your product or even to ensure they will remember you. In this talk, I share how to craft demos by gathering requirements and using them to build your demo and story. I also teach you how to prepare for a smooth demo delivery. After this talk, you will have all the theoretical knowledge to craft and deliver demos that achieve your (and your stakeholder’s) objectives.

treasury_media.title: GitHub - Developer Relations Strategy -  Step By Step
treasury_media.description: An adaptable framework for preparing a strategy planning session for your DevRel team.

treasury_media.title: Planning your team's dev rel strategy -- Naomi Pentrel
treasury_media.description: In this talk from DevRelCon San Francisco 2019, I walk through the key steps in a DevRel strategy planning process.

treasury_media.title: Aggregation Framework Performance Pitfalls
treasury_media.description: A talk about the most common performance pitfalls developers encounter when building with MongoDB.

treasury_media.title: MongoDB Change Streams with Python | MongoDB
Use $push to insert elements into an array
treasury_media.description: Learn various ways of pushing to an array with the new $push operator.

treasury_media.title: Naomi’s Blog
treasury_media.description: Developer advocate at MongoDB, occasional blogger, hacker, and hackathon organizer. Previously engineer at Google, Microsoft, and Bloomberg.
